meanings.definition: Form a mental image of something
meanings.sent1: She visualises her dream house with a big garden.
meanings.sent2: He often visualises his upcoming vacation to relax.
meanings.sent3: The cat visualises catching the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: Her mind visualises a peaceful meadow under the starry sky.
meanings.sent5: The artist visualises the masterpiece before putting brush to canvas.

meanings.definition: Imagine or remember something in a visual way
meanings.sent1: He visualises the map to remember the way home.
meanings.sent2: She visualises her childhood home when feeling nostalgic.
meanings.sent3: The student visualises acing the exam with a magic wand.
meanings.sent4: His memory visualises the laughter of his friends on that day.
meanings.sent5: The author visualises the characters in vivid detail as she writes.
